description: Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 Series Solicitation:  T8493-220052/A.  This requirement is to acquire an item for the CESSNA and King Air  for Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 Series Solicitation:  T8493-220052/A

### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3440856667
* **Reference Number:** WS3440856667-Doc3839600801
* **Publication Date:** March 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 20, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Procurement Category:** Goods - Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Standard Identification Codes:**
  • UNSPSC: 25170000 (Transportation Components and Systems)
  • CFTA: Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **End User:** Department of Transport (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
  • Name: Oliver Morones (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
  • Email: [oliver.morones@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oliver.morones@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

The tender is for the supply arrangement of items for the CESSNA and King Air aircraft for Transport Canada's Air Services Directorate. Suppliers participating in this solicitation must be able to provide the specified items from the following list:

* Aero Precision
* Aero Supplies
* NDT Products
* BSF International
* Bell Helicopter
* Dart Aerospace
* Field Aviation
* Helitrades Inc
* Maxcraft Avionics
* MHD Rockland
* Patlon Aircraft
* PHP Canada ULC
* Pole Air Aviation
* Standard Aero
* Szabo Aviation
* Textron Aviation
* Tower Aerospace
* Tulmar Safety
* Unisource Technology
* Zepoli International
* Alpine Aerotech
* JHT Defense
* Kadex Aero Supply
* National Helicopters
* Newcastle Aviation
* Optima Aero
* Southeast Aerospace
* Canada West Avionics
* Eagle Copters
* Genaire LTD
* Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
* Mills Sterling
* Tronosjet Maintenance
* Pratt & Whitney Canada
* Arnprior Aerospace
* Aero Technical Components
